World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 24 日星期三 04:30:10 GMT 120
Bhutto scion aims to focus on Pakistan's youth, break with old politicsYouth appeal and ambitious plans to combat climate change form the core of Bilawal Bhutto Zardari's effort to become prime minister of Pakistan, which, if successful, would make him its youngest premier since his mother Benazir was in office. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 04:05:47 GMT M3QHE2X3V5POTEQ4HMVH4TEKWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bhutto-scion-aims-focus-pakistans-youth-break-with-old-politics-2024-01-24/Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Australia PM set to water down proposed tax cuts for wealthy, stoking inflation fearsAustralia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Wednesday he would consult lawmakers to modify proposed tax cuts for higher earners, potentially breaking an election pledge in a decision some economists worry could stoke inflation. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:57:37 GMT BBMABSTUKFJVNJFOYCYQAXV7JI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-set-water-down-propose-tax-cuts-wealthy-2024-01-24/Alasdair Pal, Stella Qiu世界亚太地区
US military strikes two Houthi anti-ship missiles in YemenThe U.S. military carried out more strikes in Yemen early on Wednesday, destroying two Houthi anti-ship missiles that were aimed at the Red Sea and were preparing to launch, the U.S. military said in a statement. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 02:56:55 GMT GXITDHR3PRIYJISOCIZ2TO45WA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-military-strikes-two-houthi-anti-ship-missiles-yemen-2024-01-24/Phil Stewart世界中东
North Korea fires cruise missiles off west coast, Seoul saysNorth Korea fired multiple cruise missiles towards the sea off its west coast on Wednesday, South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff said, in the latest sign of heightened tensions on the Korean peninsula. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:30:57 GMT Y4SO37ZIKJNXTA5WXM5IHB5N3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-cruise-missiles-off-west-coast-seoul-says-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
Plan for one-month Gaza truce makes progress as Israel hits Khan YounisIsrael and Hamas have moved closer to agreement on a 30-day ceasefire in Gaza when Israeli hostages and Palestinians prisoners would be released, sources told Reuters, as Israel pressed ahead with its assault on southern Gaza's main city of Khan Younis. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:29:38 GMT AWMO5ZFLUFJW3LDB4BAPTZM4YQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/plan-one-month-gaza-truce-makes-progress-israel-hits-khan-younis-2024-01-24/Andrew Mills, Arafat Barbakh, Emily Rose世界中东
Philippine says armed forces to ensure 'unimpeded and peaceful' exploration in South China SeaThe Philippines armed forces will guarantee the "unimpeded and peaceful" exploration and exploitation of natural resources within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ) as it shifts its focus to external defence, Manila's defense secretary said. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:27:14 GMT XGYJZZI7S5IURNZZJGO5XILVAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-says-armed-forces-ensure-unimpeded-peaceful-exploration-south-china-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
Plane carrying Rio Tinto workers crashes in Canada's Northwest, some killedA small plane carrying Rio Tinto , workers crashed near Fort Smith in Canada's remote Northwest Territories on Tuesday during a flight to its Diavik diamond mine, killing some people on board. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:18:42 GMT 43VNHJAMTVNRVMWK7F6RSIYVFE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/plane-crashes-canadas-northwest-territories-some-killed-2024-01-24/Nia Williams世界美洲
Tuvalu expected to review Taiwan ties after election - ministerTuvalu expects to review its diplomatic ties with Taiwan after Friday's election, Finance Minister Seve Paeniu told Reuters, adding voters in the tiny Pacific Island nation wanted more financial support from the international community for climate change and development. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:06:46 GMT AEDREMNUPVLSDF6CK5UF4PIW4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tuvalu-expected-review-taiwan-ties-after-election-minister-2024-01-24/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Ukraine's Zelenskiy forms business council after outcry over banker's arrestUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced the creation of a council to "support entrepreneurship" on Tuesday aimed at bringing business leaders onside in wartime after many expressed outrage at the arrest of a prominent banker. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:43:19 GMT W7B3KDLYSFIWZECASCJ3NQ3HNY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-forms-business-council-after-outcry-over-bankers-arrest-2024-01-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Lula upset by lack of clear goals in Brazil's new industry plan, sources sayBrazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was displeased by a new industrial development plan announced on Monday by the government and told ministers it lacked clear targets, said two people familiar with the matter. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:14:50 GMT GYXSNWUGQJO73LGFUI3OOXPCMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/lula-upset-by-lack-clear-goals-brazils-new-industry-plan-sources-say-2024-01-24/Lisandra Paraguassu世界美洲
Thai court to decide former PM hopeful's fate in election caseA Thai court will on Wednesday rule on whether former prime ministerial hopeful Pita Limjaroenrat broke the rules of a 2023 election won by his party, the first of two cases targeting an opposition that has threatened radical reforms to the country. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 00:03:36 GMT ON4YGDBT7NOVLG35F2FDZV6J3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-court-decide-former-pm-hopefuls-fate-election-case-2024-01-24/Panu Wongcha-Um, Panarat Thepgumpanat世界亚太地区
